center_panel.button-css: height: 25px; font-weight: normal; background-color: #E0E0E0; color: #000; border: 2px solid #05668D; border-radius: 15px; padding: 10px;
center_panel.button-hover-css: font-weight: bold; background-color: #e4f2f4; color: #05668D; border: 3px solid #028090; border-radius: 15px; padding: 15px;
center_panel.button-pressed-css: font-weight: lighter; background-color: #05668D; color: #E0E0E0; border: none;

settings-css.control-css: background-color: #FFF; color: #000; border: 3px solid #222; border-radius: 5px; padding: 5px; margin-right: 15px;
settings-css.control-readonly-css: background-color: #E0E0E0; color: #333; border: 3px solid #BDBDBD; border-radius: 5px; padding: 5px; margin-right: 15px;
settings-css.button-css: height: 20px; font-weight: normal; background-color: #E0E0E0; color: #05668D; border: 4px solid #05668D; border-radius: 5px; padding: 5px;
settings-css.button-hover-css: font-weight: bold; background-color: #ccc; color: #DEDEDE; border: 3px solid #0b313f; border-radius: 5px; padding: 5px;
settings-css.button-pressed-css: font-weight: bold; background-color: #05668D; color: #129ad0; border: none;
settings-css.card-css: text-align: left; border: 3px solid #BDBDBD; border-radius: 5px; padding: 5px; background-color: #FFFFFF; color: #000; margin-right: 15px;
settings-css.item-card-css: border: 2px solid #ccc; border-radius: 5px; padding: 8px; margin: 4px; background-color: #f9f9f9;
settings-css.object-button-css: font-weight: normal; background-color: #DDD; color: #FF9922; border: 4px solid #FF9922; border-radius: 5px; padding: 5px; margin: auto;
settings-css.object-button-hover-css: font-weight: bold; color: #555; border: 3px solid #be7a2c; border-radius: 5px; padding: 5px;
settings-css.disabled-object-button-css: background-color: #777; font-weight: normal; color: #555; border: 4px solid #555; border-radius: 5px; padding: 5px; margin: auto;

right_panel.chat-text-css: border: 4px solid #05668D; border-radius: 20px; padding: 10px; background-color: #e4f2f4; color: #000;
right_panel.user-message-css: vertical-align: text-top; border: 3px solid #81580d; border-radius: 15px; padding: 10px; margin-left: 10px; margin-right: 100px; background-color: #e6a836; color: #000;
right_panel.comment-css: vertical-align: text-top; border: 3px solid #5ca0d0; border-radius: 15px; padding: 10px; margin-left: 10px; margin-right: 100px; background-color: #6dbdf5; color: #222255;
right_panel.ai-message-css: vertical-align: text-top; border: 4px solid #05668D; border-radius: 15px; padding: 10px; margin-left: 100px; background-color: #FFFFFF; color: #000;
